English: I have three cats and two dogs.
French: J'ai trois chats et deux chiens.

English: Do you prefer coffee or tea?
French: Préfères-tu le café ou le thé ?

English: I need to buy ten apples for the recipe.
French: Je dois acheter dix pommes pour la recette.

English: The meeting will start at twelve o'clock.
I will visit Paris next summer.
Could you please turn off the lights?
French: Pourriez-vous s'il vous plaît éteindre les lumières ?

English: They have been married for fifteen years.
French: Ils sont ensemble depuis quinze ans.

English: We must finish our project by Friday.
French: Nous devons terminer notre projet d'ici vendredi.

English: The restaurant has a five-star rating.
French: Le restaurant a une note de cinq étoiles.
